comments.text:
Deu pra perceber ali que o Andy sabia como a música ia rolar, mas tudo bem. 
Acho que eles praticam com o músico o tipo de batida que vai rolar nas 
músicas. Não faz mal nenhum prever o que está por vir, assim o improviso 
fica mais show ainda.
comments.author: Amanda Pereira

comments.text:
Cara, eles tem anos de trabalhos juntos. Improvisar entre eles mesmo se 
torna meio que um hábito. Eles também estudam princípios para improvisação. 
Eles são de mais, hilários.

top_comment.text:
Dois rivais. Uma confeitaria. Um bolo irresistível. Um figurante em busca 
da fama. Um musical Glee só que não.

Jogo: Musical Improvável #13
Tema (frase): "Não toque no meu bolinho"
MC Convidado: Guilherme Tomé
Jogadora Convidada: Cristiane Wersom
Músico Convidado: Daniel Tauszig﻿

captions.text:
"Improbable Musical",
everyone plays.

Let me pick some sentences
and choose one...
'Don't touch my cake'

'Don't touch my cake' will
inspire their improvisation

and at any point they
will sing and dance,

because this is
"Improbable Musical", go.

I'm finishing it,
I'm finishing it!

- The flavors were replaced!
- That's the thing, the surprise!

Look... Surprise cake!
Surprise cake!

I don't need surprises,
I'm running a business,

what I need is people finding, wanting
and buying the cakes, or else...
No!
No!
I own this place
The boss is me

- The employee is you
- Is me

I think I made myself clear,
crystal clear

I want you to know
that the boss, the boss
the boss is me!

- How are you, Gilberto?
- How are you?
May I cal you Gil?
I'm terrible at coming on to guys...

Gil, give me a slice of
pineapple cake...

- Surprise?
- No, it's pineapple.

- Surprise pineapple?
- What is this surprise pineapple?

Is he just saying 'surprise pineapple'
or is he coming on to me?

I'm getting nervous,
I'm sweating...

- Look who's here, baby!
- Stop it, honey...

- You look wonderful today!
- Enough!

- What are you eating?
- Stop grabbing me...
Look out!

Stop it...
He's my boyfriend...

Gilberto, grab
something for us to eat.

- What's up, baby?
- There's this wonderful cake...

Gilberto was fooling around replacing
flavors, but there's this one...

- I think the cake was wonderful!
- What?

- You know, baby...
- Just a minute!

You disobeyed my order and gave
a cake not to a regular customer...
But for my woman!

I just thought...
What if, what if... What if!

If she got a surprise?
Your woman deserves a surprise!

Do you know what's the surprise?
The pink slip!
With your name on it!
I've been keeping this for a while!

I don't know if you got
that song I sang to you...

That the boss!
The boss! The boss!

The boss!
Is me.

There's your pink slip, dear.
Have a nice day.

- Come on, baby, let's play tennis.
- Sure.
Yeah, yeah, you're on a bad trip

- Looks like you got
the pink slip - Trip

All you can do is sob
because now you don't have a job

- I got laid off, I got laid off
- He got laid off

- What a jerk off
- Laid off

- I got laid off
- He got laid off

I got laid off, I got laid off,
what a je-je-je
Je-je-je-je-jerk off

- Je-je-jerk off!
- The song is already over!

- What now? - The sales chart is going
down for three months in a row.

Who cares about charts!
My closet is running empty!

- Let me...
- The trip to Paris... Where is it?

Let me explain it to you:
If we don't sell, we don't buy!

This isn't what you promised
when you married me!

Easy, everything will
work out, we...
Open your mouth.
Open your mouth.
You ate Gilberto's cake!

- Actually...
- Actually what?
I did!

- Are you there, baby?
- Gilberto! He found out!
He was here right now!

He was following me! I think
he saw me! He'll soon be here!
He's here in the cake shop!
He know everything, Gilberto!

- Do you want anything else, or...
- I'd like to speak with your confectioner.

Okay. I guess I'll be useless
for the rest of the scene,

- so I'd like to thank you for
putting me in. - Don't mention it.
I'm glad to know I could be a waiter!

Your name, my dear?
Oh, it doesn't matter!
I have an idea, baby!
Put poison in the cake!
Yes!

I heard an information,
now I'm relevant to the story!
Finally!
I used to be worthless
I had no purpose in life

But now I can save his
- check out the rhyme - life
I was just a waiter delivering stuff

But now I know - check out
the rhyme - a lot of stuff

How much will you pay
if you don't want me to say
Because now I know the truth

You better give me some money,
come on honey
Or else this scene will end up bad

Will end up bad...
Suck it!

- You can have the...
- Calm down! Calm down!

- Calm down! Calm down!
- He's calm, he's just leaving!

Ten percent! Twenty percent!
Thirty percent and a cucumber soda!

No! He's right!
We shouldn't kill your husband!
We should tell him the truth.

I'm here to tell you the truth
before he gets any relevance!
Let me try!

- No, I know...
- Excuse me, I'm going to talk...

- Go to the kitchen!
- In the last scene, he said...

I was going to put poison in the
cake, but now I won't kill you!

- Dammit...
- I've said everything you knew!

- See what you've done?
- What?

- The scene would be funnier with Cuca!
- The extra?

- So you were going to kill me?
- Because I love Gil.

- I had noticed that.
- Not just the singer Gilberto Gil, but this Gil too!

- I had noticed that too.
- And I loved other men too.

All right, no need to give me details!
My failure should have a limit.
Your limit is pretty high!

I understand Gil, because
he's a cake artist.

When I was going to try some, he said
'don't touch my cake, it's not read'!

To me, he always said
'touch my cake'.

How about this: You get your job
back and we become partners.
Let me understand...

Sometimes it's important
to feel useful

Sometimes it's important
to build the future together

Sometimes it's important
to have teamwork

Together you can build a better future,
everybody with me
A better future

- A better future
- A better future

No wars, everybody
for a better future

- A better future
- Everybody is useful

- A better future
- Everybody is useful

If we all work together,
a better future

- Because everybody is useful, everybody is useful
- Why raise the pitch
Must sing on pitch

Maybe the payphone
card isn't useful

- But everyone else is useful
- Even the extras
I guess I needed to wake

How could all of this
happen because of a cake

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.
Are you working?

It was me, hot stuff,
I told him!
